title: VoltWorx
subtitle: Startup Student Connector
description: VoltWorx is a platform that connects students with real startup projects, giving them hands-on experience while helping early-stage founders get quality work done quickly and affordably. It bridges the gap between learning and real execution by letting students build real-world products, and enabling startups to validate ideas faster with skilled, motivated talent.

title: Smart Student Hub
subtitle: Certificate Verification Platform
description: Smart Student Hub is a streamlined platform built to simplify certificate verification and improve placement workflows inside colleges. It allows students to securely upload and manage all their academic certificates, while the system automatically validates documents, reduces manual checking, and prevents verification delays. For placements, it provides companies with quick access to verified student profiles, ensuring faster, more reliable recruitment.
